data.name: Portobugia
data.detailed_description:
Portobugia is a survival game where you manage a port and you must supply a city with goods and food. You must unload boats, but, be careful, some of them could be infected!

What happened?

After the First World War, Eastern Europe has fallen into chaos... Bugs are eating all the crops, diseases are spreading, bandits are everywhere... There is no government to bring peace in the region and so cities must survive by themselves...

Inspect boats!

When a boat arrived in your port, you must inspect before unloading or refusing it. You must verify the report by looking at the boat and comparing to the report. If you correctly verify the report you will get some rewards. But if you don't pay attention enough to the infection, you will probably have problems with bugs that will eat some of your resources!

Manage your port!

You start with a very basic port, but this port will not be enough to survive in this post WWI world. You must quickly develop your infrastructures if you want to last. Construct new buildings or upgrade the one you already have. You can also hire employees to increase your building’s efficiency, but they will ask for a daily income. Also, don't forget to send some resources to the city, otherwise they will die!

The world will not be kind!

Try to improve your situation as soon as possible! Because events will put you in difficulty! And a bad row of boat and you are done! Prepare yourself for bad times, winter will be harsh!

Key features

  • Boat inspection
  • Random events
  • Buildings
  • Upgrades
  • Employees
  • Resources management
  • Soon : Weather and seasons
  • Soon : Technologies
